articles.author: Sam Joseph Semon
articles.title: Rihanna shares a photo of her son pouting 'when he found out his sibling is going to the Oscars' - Daily Mail
articles.description: In the post, the 35-year-old hitmaker was seen while spending quality time with her child, whom she shares with A$AP Rocky, and she showed him the music video for her track Lift Me Up.
articles.content:
Rihanna shared a duo of snaps and a video featuring her baby son to her Instagram account on Sunday.

articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: 'It still hurts': Chris Rock speaks about Will Smith slap for first time - The Guardian
articles.description: Comedian lays into victimhood, Jada Pinkett Smith and her husband during his new standup show, saying ‘she hurt him way more than he hurt me’
articles.content:
Chris Rock has spoken at length for the first time about being slapped by Will Smith during the Oscars, almost a year since the scandal that shocked millions watching around the world.
